```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
root = here::here('tag_data')
lotek_d = file.path(root, "Lotek")
dir.exists(lotek_d)
```


```{r}
d = list.dirs(lotek_d, recursive = T)[[30]]

d %>% 
  list.files() %>% 
  lapply(
    function(s) {
      strsplit(s, split = '.', fixed=T)[[1]]
    }
  )
  



```
